OrgName.entry: YORKSHIRE AND HUMBER REGIONAL MIGRATION PARTNERSHIP

Desc.entry: The Yorkshire and humber Regional Migration Partnership works with national, regional and local government to ensure that the Yorkshire and Humber region of the UK can deal with and benefit from migration. Works in partnership with agencies across the statutory, voluntary, communities and private sectors to help support the delivery of high quality services to migrants in a way that benefits everone living in local communities. The partnership has 5 key roles: strategic leadership and co-ordination for the region around migration issues; management of the public sector asylum accommodation contract; effective integration of refugees and other migrants; intelligence and research.
